title: Upgrade commons-collections to 3.2.2
description: Once COLLECTIONS-580 is solved and commons-collections 3.2.2 is out the door we should upgrade. This should ideally happen before 5.4 release.

comments.author: ASF subversion and git services
comments.content:
Commit 1714638 from janhoy@apache.org in branch 'dev/trunk'
[ https://svn.apache.org/r1714638 ]

SOLR-8269: Upgrade commons-collections to 3.2.2. This fixes a known serialization vulnerability

comments.author: ASF subversion and git services
comments.content:
Commit 1714639 from janhoy@apache.org in branch 'dev/branches/branch_5x'
[ https://svn.apache.org/r1714639 ]

SOLR-8269: Upgrade commons-collections to 3.2.2. This fixes a known serialization vulnerability (backport)

comments.author: Jan Høydahl
comments.content:
commons-collections 3.2.2 is now released, see http://commons.apache.org/proper/commons-collections/release_3_2_2.html
All tests pass. Committed to trunk and 5x
